mapper.insert: INSERT INTO all_jjim VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(jno)+1,1) FROM all_jjim), #{cno},#{type},#{id},SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_jjim WHERE cno=#{cno} AND type=#{type} AND id=#{id}
SELECT jno,cno,regdate,name,poster,address,phone FROM all_jjim aj,project_food_house pf WHERE aj.cno=pf.fno AND id=#{id} ORDER BY jno DESC
